#Text=Wikinews interviews Claire Lin of Pepsico Foods Taiwan
#Text=Thursday , November 15 , 2007

#Text=Following the launch of the Doritos Coolpedia website on September 28 , and voting on October 14 , this website has now become a complex portal with textures , pictures , and multimedia after adding video candidate function .

#Text=As Coolpedia originally followed Wikipedia 's example of Internet-relay contribution , Wikinews Reporter Rico Shen interviewed Claire Lin ( Assistant Media Manager of Marketing Department , Pepsico Foods Taiwan ) about the origins and objectives of Coolpedia .
#Text=Interview
#Text=With
#Text=witnessing the rise of Coolpedia , I wonder to know the origins of founding Coolpedia .

#Text=With a variety changes of some Internet language and phrases for younger people on the Internet newsgroups , BBS sites , discussion forums in Taiwan , Pepsico Taiwan decided to found Coolpedia website to gather some good quotes with their ( younger people ) creations named as " Internet Citizens " .

column1: #Text=This foundation is matched as Doritos ' brand symbol - Bold & Creation , and Coolpedia made a impact with a great challenge in Taiwan 's Internet culture .
#Text=With visiting this website and referred some backgrounds provided by Ogilvy Public Relations Taiwan , I found an interesting idea on the pursuit of " followed Wikipedia 's example " .

column1: #Text=What do operation team of Coolpedia think about this ?
#Text=Every Internet user knows " Wikipedia is the total of knowledge " , but we ( the team ) think Coolpedia as the combination of " Internet culture " and " younger people " in Taiwan .

column1: #Text=Based on the multiple creation , we launched this site firstly with texture and picture contribution functions , next will join multimedia and video functions .
#Text=I believe that Coolpedia and Wikipedia effected Internet culture in Taiwan deeply .
#Text=What 's about the internationalization with several Chinese People from many countries world-wide ?
#Text=Doritos is a notable world-class international brand by Pepsico .
#Text=Many branches from Pepsico has their own ideas with their country culture , therefore , we wo n't promote the inter-language version of Taiwan 's Coolpedia .
#Text=I 've ever participated lots of press conferences and seminars such as YouTube , Microsoft , and some companies from IT industry in Taiwan .
#Text=Those above mentioned on some issues of media reusing , copyright , and practices in society in Taiwan .

#Text=Especially in some cases , some companies was sensitive on the computing crimes , pirate and illegal copy issues because those above were discussed by some people from governmental and security industries in Taiwan .
#Text=And also , some Internet users may spread their own files created by the others so that the common practice will turn from bad to worse .
#Text=With those issues , what should Pepsico regulate participants from Coolpedia ?
#Text=We 've regulated policies for participants .
#Text=Of course , copyright violation will disadvantage Taiwan 's Common Practice .
#Text=If some participated works violated common practice , we 'll decline those participations .
#Text=Even though Coolpedia is similar as Kuso , but it is a conjunction with Internet creation phrases and younger people .
